messages.subject: Weekly Incident Bulletin
messages.previewLine: Downtown blackout traced to rogue maintenance drone.
messages.body:
Atlas City Newswire -- Incident Highlights:

* Power grid glitch downtown attributed to a rogue maintenance drone.
* Two municipal nodes were found serving counterfeit firmware packages.
* The riverfront AR kiosk now loops a recruitment ad for "Atlas Pioneer Society."

Full brief attached for those with clearance. Rumor says the Pioneer Society is not recruiting civilians.

-- Automated Dispatch

messages.subject: Renew your Cortex Warranty!
messages.previewLine: Your cortex shield coverage expires today. Act now to avoid downtime.
messages.body:
Dear Valued Customer,

We noticed your Cortex Shield warranty expired 23 minutes ago. Renew now to receive a complimentary anti-static sleeve and priority service badge.

Visit atlas-extended.biz/renew (requires biometric verification).

This message auto-destructs in 18 hours or whenever legal approves.

-- Totally Real Warranty Dept

messages.subject: [INIT] Handshake Protocol
messages.previewLine: We’ve been watching your signal. Time to see if you can stay unseen.
messages.body:
Operator—

If this reached you, the filters didn’t. That’s a good sign. Means you’re either competent, or lucky. Both are usable.

You don’t know us yet. You don’t need to. Names get people killed. Call us “the Underground” if you want to label it. We route around Atlas, the city’s megacorp darlings, and the security agencies that orbit them like scavengers.

Before we trust you with anything that matters, we need to see you walk without tripping the alarms. Simple proof-of-work.

Target: an Atlas edge relay, low priority. Their own people barely look at it, which makes it perfect for us. One of our scouts brushed it earlier tonight and left a faint line in the logs mentioning a “handshake probe.” That reference to us? It needs to vanish.

Your task:

Scan the host to confirm it’s alive and exposed.

Establish a session on the relay.

Navigate to the log directory.

Remove the probe log: probe_handshake.log.

Drop your connection cleanly.

Keep it quiet. No extra files touched, no sightseeing in other directories, no clever tricks. We’re not impressed by fireworks, only by ghosts.

If the relay stays quiet for the next cycle, we’ll assume you passed. Then we talk about work that actually pays.

— No names
